languages.text: "Для старой Риззы честь вот так запросто беседовать с Вашей Светлостью".
"It's an honour for old Ryzza to have a conversation with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, just like that."
languages.original_text: "Для старой Риззы честь вот так запросто беседовать с Вашей Светлостью".

languages.text: “能和大人你谈话，是老莱萨的荣幸，一点都没错。”
languages.original_text: "It's an honour for old Ryzza to have a conversation with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, just like that."

traits.locale_text: “能和大人你谈话，是老莱萨的荣幸，一点都没错。”

languages.text: 「陛下、貴方とこうしてお話が出来るなんて、老いぼれのリザはとても光栄です」
languages.original_text: "It's an honour for old Ryzza to have a conversation with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, just like that."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、貴方とこうしてお話が出来るなんて、老いぼれのリザはとても光栄です」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Es un honor para la vieja Ryzza conversar con mi{mf|lordship|lady}».
languages.original_text: "It's an honour for old Ryzza to have a conversation with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, just like that."

traits.locale_text: «Es un honor para la vieja Ryzza conversar con mi{mf|lordship|lady}».

languages.text: "Es ist eine Ehre für die alte Ryzza, einfach so mit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu reden."
languages.original_text: "It's an honour for old Ryzza to have a conversation with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, just like that."

languages.text: « La vieille pirate que je suis est honorée d'avoir eu cette conversation avec Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'yle böyle bir sohbet edebilmek, Koca Ryzza için bir onurdur."
